DOC.brief_summary: A Prospective Multi-center Study Investigate EGFR-TKI Resistance Profile Chinese Patients Advanced EGFRm+ NSCLC
DOC.brief_title: EGFR-TKI Resistance Profile Chinese Patients With Advanced EGFRm+ NSCLC
DOC.detailed_description: Patients EGFR mutation present secondary resistance prior first-generation EGFR-TKI receive biopsy least progressed lesion able provide tissue pathological examination NGS testing.All enrol patient follow clinical outcome ( treatment , tumor response , survival , etc ) .
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent prior study specific procedure . Male female patient age 18 year old . Histological confirmation stage IIIB/IV NSCLC . Documented EGFR mutation positive . WHO Performance Status 0 , 1 2 Any significant clinical disorder laboratory find make undesirable patient participate study . Previous ( within 6 month ) current treatment AZD9291 .
